mav_sim.chap10.path_follower module¶

path_follower.py implements a class for following a path with a mav

class mav_sim.chap10.path_follower.PathFollower¶

Bases: object

Class for path following

update(path: MsgPath, state: MsgState) → MsgAutopilot¶

Update the control for following the path

Parameters:

  • path – path to be followed

  • state – current state of the mav

Returns:

Commands to autopilot for following the path

Return type:

autopilot_commands

mav_sim.chap10.path_follower.follow_orbit(path: MsgPath, state: MsgState, k_orbit: float, gravity: float) → MsgAutopilot¶

Calculate the autopilot commands for following a circular path

Parameters:

  • path – circular orbit to be followed

  • state – current state of the mav

  • k_orbit – Convergence gain for reducing error to orbit

  • gravity – Gravity constant

Returns:

the commands required for executing the desired orbit

Return type:

autopilot_commands

mav_sim.chap10.path_follower.follow_straight_line(path: MsgPath, state: MsgState, k_path: float, chi_inf: float) → MsgAutopilot¶

Calculate the autopilot commands for following a straight line

Parameters:

  • path – straight-line path to be followed

  • state – current state of the mav

  • k_path – convergence gain for converging to the path

  • chi_inf – Angle to take towards path when at an infinite distance from the path

Returns:

the commands required for executing the desired line

Return type:

autopilot_commands
